Generate metadata

Source: R/generate_metadata.R
generate_metadata.Rd

Generate metadata for OpenGWAS datasets.

generate_metadata(
  munged_files,
  infer_builds = TRUE,
  drop_na_N = TRUE,
  trait_groups = NULL,
  force_new = FALSE,
  save_dir = tempdir(),
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

munged_files

List of paths to summary statostics files that have been munged with import_sumstats.
infer_builds

Infer genome builds of each file.
drop_na_N

Drop rows without "N" (total sample size).
trait_groups

[Optional] A vector of strings. Creates a new column "trait_groups" based on a series of substring searches.
force_new

Create a new metadata file even when one already exists in save_dir.
save_dir

Directory to save metadata to.
verbose

Print messages.

Value

data.frame of OpenGWAS metadata.

Contents

Developed by Brian Schilder.
